LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlist_Letter_Title: You have Enlisted into the Brotherhood of Steel.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlist_Letter_Label:
Initiate, this is a message from your chapter elder. I would like to congratulate you on passing your trials. You have been picked to be a part of the Brotherhood, do not make the same mistake as our forbearers.

 You will be issued a standard salary every week for you and your team as well as provisions that can be picked up at our bases when you are not on patrol or finding lost technology. The {FACTION_name} has bunkers and facilities in order to better train your team, use them wisely.

 -Ad Victoriam
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlist_Button_Label: Enlist into the Brotherhood of Steel.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlist_Button_Desc: Sign a new contract with The Brotherhood of Steel.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlist_Requrements_Not_Satisfied: You need to have minimum of 10 goodwill, currently you have only {0} goodwill.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlisted_With_Key: Enlisted with: The Brotherhood of Steel
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Menu_Missions_Desc: While leaving the bunker you ask around about any potential tasks that need doing.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Salary_Desc: You are entitled to collect wages from this faction every 14 days.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Provisions_Desc:
Provisions will arrive via your caravan inventory every 10 days:

- 6 BoS Food Crate 
- ×1 BoS tECHrate
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Provisions_Desc_Standard_Issue:
BoS standard Issue gear will arrive via your caravan inventory every 30 days:

- ×2 BoS Army Weapon Crate 
- ×2 BoS Army Uniform Crate
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Storage_Desc: Store items from your caravan to your faction stash. Faction stashes transfer across all of the faction's outposts and will save contents even if you are no longer enlisted.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Part_Time_Job_Desc: Pull additional duties and cover for your knight and scribe brothers for $10 an hour.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Hospital_Desc: Check in with the hospital of this base. This service tends to all of your team with industrial medicine. Immunity gain is also increased while your team is in the hospital.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Shooting_Training_Desc:
Train your knights, paladins and intitiats with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Shooting, Melee 

 Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Survival_Training_Desc:
Train your scribes with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- 
- Crafting
- Intellectual
- Medicine

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Turn_In_Desc: Turn in war prisoners and high value targets to BoS facilities.\n\n -Turning over any hostile pawns do not result in a slavery debuff-
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Resign_Menu_Text: You will resign from the Brotherhood effective immediately. (-25 in relations)
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Resign_Button_Label: You have successfully resigned from the Brotherhood of Steel. (-25 relations)
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Enlisted_To_Hostile_Faction: cannot join because you are enlisted with their enemy, {HOSTILEFACTION_name}
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Kick_Out_Label_Title: An order for your contract's immediate termination from service has been filed by {LEADER_nameDef}. You have been kicked out from the {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.FCP_BoS_Reinforcements_Button_Desc: Call for reinforcements from your faction. Amount of knights, paladins and scribes they send depends on your current relations.
